description: NTS Map: 082O02Easy hike around the hill by  Sibbald Lake. Hike is mostly in the woods. The trail starts out by the lake and ends at the lake.
directions: Highway #1 west to Sibbald Creek turn off. Follow gravel/paved highway to Sibbald Lake Campground. Turn left at 4 way intersection and follow to parking lot.
title: Sibbald Lake Trail
